text:
@realDonaldTrump @RickPamplin Let me guess. You're watching yourself on a replay of that ridiculous "Town Hall" on Fox News?

Or wait! SARCASM again? Gotcha, Li'l Don! You have the best SARCASM. The best! SARCASM like nobody's ever seen before!

#TrumpIsAnIdiot
#COVID19
